title: Boards remains terrible for longer discussions.
body: I'm currently involved in a giant lore discussion including one Rioter, and boy it's getting annoying to try to figure out nested view. I get  an announcement that someone has replied to my post, but if it's not immediately visible (meaning I have to hit 'show more') it doesn't immediately zoom me  into their post when I click the option to view it. This makes having long discussions basically impossible. Can we please have a fix for that?

replies.body:
Discussion and Chronological view could use a better transition so it automatically quotes the who the person is replying to when switching if he hasn't done so in his own post when going from the former to the latter let's say.

That would be nice, most of the time Chronological is a pain to use because you just have no idea who is actually talking to who, for the most part.

With shorter posts Discussion view is pretty cool, but for longer ones it's always better to have things in Chronological.

I believe when user-created boards come out, they're planning on having the board owners choose either Discussion or Chrono view for the board -- so there won't be any compatibility issues.
Yeah having a longer post is impossible on here. Basically you try and have something that is worthwhile staying on the top for awhile and it will never go back to the top and be forever lost. :/
